name: Daily Tech News Digest
description: Aggregate and summarize tech news from multiple RSS feeds

config.prompt: Create a morning tech news digest from these articles. Group them by category (AI/ML, Programming, Startups, etc.). Write a brief 1-2 sentence summary for each. Include the source. Keep the total under 1800 characters for Discord. Add relevant emojis.
config.system_prompt: You are a tech journalist creating a daily digest for developers. Be informative but concise.
